summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsGive BackThe Centella Cleasning Foam from Mixsoon is a gentle cleansing foam that soothes irritation while clearing pores and maintains deep hydration. Its lightweight formula is perfect for sensitive or easily irritated skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsThe velvety formula transforms into a rich lather that is refreshing to the skinWashes and moisturize the skin at the same timeCreated to treat acne and remove any pore-clogging impuritiesKey IngredientsCentella Asiatica - Promotes collagen production, which helps to heal wounds and scarsSalicylic Acid - Treats acne by reducing skin inflammation and rednessItem 2643831How To UseLather up product on hands and gently massage on damp skin. Rinse off with lukewarm water.IngredientsWater, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Propanediol, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Acrylates Copolymer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Potassium Cocoate, Sorbitan Olivate, Salicylic Acid, Glycol Distearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Centella Asiatica Extract, Disodium EDTA.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Lather up product on hands and gently massage on damp skin. Rinse off with lukewarm water.

reviews.headline: Love this face wash!
reviews.comments: Has great foam as the last step in my double face cleansing. mixsoon products never disappoint.

faceoff_positive.comments: Absolutely one of my favorite cleansing foams. It cleans but doesn't strip my skin dry. As someone who has sensitive skin it does wonders in soothing my skin (even with sun burns). It has been a struggle for me to find a cleanser (it foams when you rub the product together) that actually works with my skin. I'm currently on my second bottle and it is a staple in my skincare routine.
faceoff_positive.headline: Mixsoon Centella Cleansing Foam 150 ml

faceoff_negative.comments: It's okay. I've had better face washes.
faceoff_negative.headline: Mixsoon Centella Cleansing Foam 150 ml
